pr_title: Add Markdown export of crash logs

timeline.message:
Add Markdown export of crash logs

Add content country as additional debug information to reports

timeline.body:
I think it's a mistake
```suggestion
                    .value("content_country", getContentCountryString())
```
timeline.bodyText:
I think it's a mistake
  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                                .value("content_country", getContentLanguageString())
          
          
            
                                .value("content_country", getContentCountryString())
timeline.bodyHTML:
I think it's a mistake

Suggested change
.value("content_country", getContentLanguageString())
.value("content_country", getContentCountryString())
timeline.author: B0pol
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -351,7 +385,8 @@ private String buildJson() {
                     .object()
                     .value("user_action", getUserActionString(errorInfo.userAction))
                     .value("request", errorInfo.request)
-                    .value("content_language", getContentLangString())
+                    .value("content_language", getContentLanguageString())
+                    .value("content_country", getContentLanguageString())

timeline.bodyHTML:
Do not duplicate

Suggested change
private String getContentCountryString() {
String contentCountry = PreferenceManager.getDefaultSharedPreferences(this)
.getString(this.getString(R.string.content_country_key), "none");
if (contentCountry.equals(getString(R.string.default_localization_key))) {
contentCountry = Locale.getDefault().toString();
}
return contentCountry;
}
private String getContentCountryString() {
return Localization.getPreferredContentCountry(this).getCountryCode();
}
timeline.author: B0pol

timeline.body:
Same, don't duplicate, just use `Localization.getPreferredLocalization(this).getLocalizationCode();`

But remember that it's useless now. See https://github.com/TeamNewPipe/NewPipe/issues/3089#issuecomment-585832060. So maybe we should gather app language, with `Localization.getAppLocale(this).getLanguage();`
timeline.bodyText:
Same, don't duplicate, just use Localization.getPreferredLocalization(this).getLocalizationCode();
But remember that it's useless now. See #3089 (comment). So maybe we should gather app language, with Localization.getAppLocale(this).getLanguage();
timeline.bodyHTML:
Same, don't duplicate, just use Localization.getPreferredLocalization(this).getLocalizationCode();

But remember that it's useless now. See #3089 (comment). So maybe we should gather app language, with Localization.getAppLocale(this).getLanguage();
timeline.author: B0pol

replies.bodyText: Ah yes. I wrote that code back in October along with some other changes for more debug info regarding the parsed YouTube pages and didn't think of your recent changes when rebasing.
replies.author: TobiGr

replies.bodyText: I think contentCountry might be useful in the future as soon as we enabled support for it again. I corrected the code but didn't include the content country in the report and also added a field for the app language.
replies.author: TobiGr

replies.bodyText:
Content country != Localization
Content Country is working. And yeah, let's not remove it, I suddenly got some ideas for Localization.
replies.author: B0pol
